00085 /* return codes for select, and drawing flags */
00086 
00087 #define MAN_TRANS_X     1
00088 #define MAN_TRANS_Y     2
00089 #define MAN_TRANS_Z     4
00090 #define MAN_TRANS_C     7
00091 
00092 #define MAN_ROT_X       8
00093 #define MAN_ROT_Y       16
00094 #define MAN_ROT_Z       32
00095 #define MAN_ROT_V       64
00096 #define MAN_ROT_T       128
00097 #define MAN_ROT_C       248
00098 
00099 #define MAN_SCALE_X     256
00100 #define MAN_SCALE_Y     512
00101 #define MAN_SCALE_Z     1024
00102 #define MAN_SCALE_C     1792
00103 
00104 /* color codes */
00105 
00106 #define MAN_RGB     0
00107 #define MAN_GHOST   1
00108 #define MAN_MOVECOL 2

00110 /* transform widget center calc helper for below */
00111 static void calc_tw_center(Scene *scene, float *co)
00112 {
00113     float *twcent= scene->twcent;
00114     float *min= scene->twmin;
00115     float *max= scene->twmax;
00116 
00117     DO_MINMAX(co, min, max);
00118     add_v3_v3(twcent, co);
00119 }
00120 
00121 static void protectflag_to_drawflags(short protectflag, short *drawflags)
00122 {
00123     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX)
00124         *drawflags &= ~MAN_TRANS_X;
00125     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY)
00126         *drawflags &= ~MAN_TRANS_Y;
00127     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ)
00128         *drawflags &= ~MAN_TRANS_Z;
00129 
00130     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX)
00131         *drawflags &= ~MAN_ROT_X;
00132     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY)
00133         *drawflags &= ~MAN_ROT_Y;
00134     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ)
00135         *drawflags &= ~MAN_ROT_Z;
00136 
00137     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEX)
00138         *drawflags &= ~MAN_SCALE_X;
00139     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEY)
00140         *drawflags &= ~MAN_SCALE_Y;
00141     if (protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEZ)
00142         *drawflags &= ~MAN_SCALE_Z;
00143 }

00145 /* for pose mode */
00146 static void stats_pose(Scene *scene, RegionView3D *rv3d, bPoseChannel *pchan)
00147 {
00148     Bone *bone= pchan->bone;
00149 
00150     if (bone) {
00151         if (bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
00152             calc_tw_center(scene, pchan->pose_head);
00153             protectflag_to_drawflags(pchan->protectflag, &rv3d->twdrawflag);
00154         }
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 /* for editmode*/
00159 static void stats_editbone(RegionView3D *rv3d, EditBone *ebo)
00160 {
00161     if (ebo->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED)
00162         protectflag_to_drawflags(OB_LOCK_LOC|OB_LOCK_ROT|OB_LOCK_SCALE, &rv3d->twdrawflag);
00163 }

00165 /* could move into BLI_math however this is only useful for display/editing purposes */
00166 static void axis_angle_to_gimbal_axis(float gmat[3][3], float axis[3], float angle)
00167 {
00168     /* X/Y are arbitrary axies, most importantly Z is the axis of rotation */
00169 
00170     float cross_vec[3];
00171     float quat[4];
00172 
00173     /* this is an un-scientific method to get a vector to cross with
00174      * XYZ intentionally YZX */
00175     cross_vec[0]= axis[1];
00176     cross_vec[1]= axis[2];
00177     cross_vec[2]= axis[0];
00178 
00179     /* X-axis */
00180     cross_v3_v3v3(gmat[0], cross_vec, axis);
00181     normalize_v3(gmat[0]);
00182     axis_angle_to_quat(quat, axis, angle);
00183     mul_qt_v3(quat, gmat[0]);
00184 
00185     /* Y-axis */
00186     axis_angle_to_quat(quat, axis, M_PI/2.0);
00187     copy_v3_v3(gmat[1], gmat[0]);
00188     mul_qt_v3(quat, gmat[1]);
00189 
00190     /* Z-axis */
00191     copy_v3_v3(gmat[2], axis);
00192 
00193     normalize_m3(gmat);
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 static int test_rotmode_euler(short rotmode)
00198 {
00199     return (ELEM(rotmode, ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE, ROT_MODE_QUAT)) ? 0:1;
00200 }
00201 
00202 int gimbal_axis(Object *ob, float gmat[][3])
00203 {
00204     if (ob) {
00205         if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
00206             bPoseChannel *pchan= get_active_posechannel(ob);
00207 
00208             if (pchan) {
00209                 float mat[3][3], tmat[3][3], obmat[3][3];
00210                 if (test_rotmode_euler(pchan->rotmode)) {
00211                     eulO_to_gimbal_axis(mat, pchan->eul, pchan->rotmode);
00212                 }
00213                 else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00214                     axis_angle_to_gimbal_axis(mat, pchan->rotAxis, pchan->rotAngle);
00215                 }
00216                 else { /* quat */
00217                     return 0;
00218                 }
00219 
00220 
00221                 /* apply bone transformation */
00222                 mul_m3_m3m3(tmat, pchan->bone->bone_mat, mat);
00223 
00224                 if (pchan->parent) {
00225                     float parent_mat[3][3];
00226 
00227                     copy_m3_m4(parent_mat, pchan->parent->pose_mat);
00228                     mul_m3_m3m3(mat, parent_mat, tmat);
00229 
00230                     /* needed if object transformation isn't identity */
00231                     copy_m3_m4(obmat, ob->obmat);
00232                     mul_m3_m3m3(gmat, obmat, mat);
00233                 }
00234                 else {
00235                     /* needed if object transformation isn't identity */
00236                     copy_m3_m4(obmat, ob->obmat);
00237                     mul_m3_m3m3(gmat, obmat, tmat);
00238                 }
00239 
00240                 normalize_m3(gmat);
00241                 return 1;
00242             }
00243         }
00244         else {
00245             if (test_rotmode_euler(ob->rotmode)) {
00246                 eulO_to_gimbal_axis(gmat, ob->rot, ob->rotmode);
00247             }
00248             else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00249                 axis_angle_to_gimbal_axis(gmat, ob->rotAxis, ob->rotAngle);
00250             }
00251             else { /* quat */
00252                 return 0;
00253             }
00254 
00255             if (ob->parent) {
00256                 float parent_mat[3][3];
00257                 copy_m3_m4(parent_mat, ob->parent->obmat);
00258                 normalize_m3(parent_mat);
00259                 mul_m3_m3m3(gmat, parent_mat, gmat);
00260             }
00261             return 1;
00262         }
00263     }
00264 
00265     return 0;
00266 }

00269 /* centroid, boundbox, of selection */
00270 /* returns total items selected */
00271 int calc_manipulator_stats(const bContext *C)
00272 {
00273     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00274     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00275     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00276     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00277     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00278     View3D *v3d= sa->spacedata.first;
00279     RegionView3D *rv3d= ar->regiondata;
00280     Base *base;
00281     Object *ob= OBACT;
00282     int a, totsel= 0;
00283 
00284     /* transform widget matrix */
00285     unit_m4(rv3d->twmat);
00286 
00287     rv3d->twdrawflag= 0xFFFF;
00288 
00289     /* transform widget centroid/center */
00290     INIT_MINMAX(scene->twmin, scene->twmax);
00291     zero_v3(scene->twcent);
00292 
00293     if (obedit) {
00294         ob= obedit;
00295         if ((ob->lay & v3d->lay)==0) return 0;
00296 
00297         if (obedit->type==OB_MESH) {
00298             BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00299             BMEditSelection ese;
00300             float vec[3]= {0,0,0};
00301 
00302             /* USE LAST SELECTE WITH ACTIVE */
00303             if ((v3d->around == V3D_ACTIVE) && BM_select_history_active_get(em->bm, &ese)) {
00304                 BM_editselection_center(&ese, vec);
00305                 calc_tw_center(scene, vec);
00306                 totsel= 1;
00307             }
00308             else {
00309                 BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00310                 BMVert *eve;
00311 
00312                 BMIter iter;
00313 
00314                 /* do vertices/edges/faces for center depending on selection
00315                  * mode. note we can't use just vertex selection flag because
00316                  * it is not flush down on changes */
00317                 if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00318                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00319                         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00320                             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00321                                 totsel++;
00322                                 calc_tw_center(scene, eve->co);
00323                             }
00324                         }
00325                     }
00326                 }
00327                 else if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00328                     BMIter itersub;
00329                     BMEdge *eed;
00330                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00331                         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00332                             /* check the vertex has a selected edge, only add it once */
00333                             BM_ITER_ELEM (eed, &itersub, eve, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00334                                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00335                                     totsel++;
00336                                     calc_tw_center(scene, eve->co);
00337                                     break;
00338                                 }
00339                             }
00340                         }
00341                     }
00342                 }
00343                 else {
00344                     BMIter itersub;
00345                     BMFace *efa;
00346                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00347                         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00348                             /* check the vertex has a selected face, only add it once */
00349                             BM_ITER_ELEM (efa, &itersub, eve, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00350                                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00351                                     totsel++;
00352                                     calc_tw_center(scene, eve->co);
00353                                     break;
00354                                 }
00355                             }
00356                         }
00357                     }
00358                 }
00359             }
00360         } /* end editmesh */
00361         else if (obedit->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00362             bArmature *arm= obedit->data;
00363             EditBone *ebo;
00364             for (ebo= arm->edbo->first; ebo; ebo=ebo->next) {
00365                 if (EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, ebo)) {
00366                     if (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL) {
00367                         calc_tw_center(scene, ebo->tail);
00368                         totsel++;
00369                     }
00370                     if (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL) {
00371                         calc_tw_center(scene, ebo->head);
00372                         totsel++;
00373                     }
00374                     if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00375                         stats_editbone(rv3d, ebo);
00376                     }
00377                 }
00378             }
00379         }
00380         else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00381             Curve *cu= obedit->data;
00382             float center[3];
00383 
00384             if (v3d->around==V3D_ACTIVE && ED_curve_actSelection(cu, center)) {
00385             calc_tw_center(scene, center);
00386                 totsel++;
00387             }
00388             else {
00389                 Nurb *nu;
00390                 BezTriple *bezt;
00391                 BPoint *bp;
00392                 ListBase *nurbs= curve_editnurbs(cu);
00393 
00394                 nu= nurbs->first;
00395                 while (nu) {
00396                     if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00397                         bezt= nu->bezt;
00398                         a= nu->pntsu;
00399                         while (a--) {
00400                             /* exceptions
00401                              * if handles are hidden then only check the center points.
00402                              * If the center knot is selected then only use this as the center point.
00403                              */
00404                             if (cu->drawflag & CU_HIDE_HANDLES) {
00405                                 if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00406                                     calc_tw_center(scene, bezt->vec[1]);
00407                                     totsel++;
00408                                 }
00409                             }
00410                             else if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00411                                 calc_tw_center(scene, bezt->vec[1]);
00412                                 totsel++;
00413                             }
00414                             else {
00415                                 if (bezt->f1) {
00416                                     calc_tw_center(scene, bezt->vec[0]);
00417                                     totsel++;
00418                                 }
00419                                 if (bezt->f3) {
00420                                     calc_tw_center(scene, bezt->vec[2]);
00421                                     totsel++;
00422                                 }
00423                             }
00424                             bezt++;
00425                         }
00426                     }
00427                     else {
00428                         bp= nu->bp;
00429                         a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00430                         while (a--) {
00431                             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00432                                 calc_tw_center(scene, bp->vec);
00433                                 totsel++;
00434                             }
00435                             bp++;
00436                         }
00437                     }
00438                     nu= nu->next;
00439                 }
00440             }
00441         }
00442         else if (obedit->type==OB_MBALL) {
00443             MetaBall *mb = (MetaBall*)obedit->data;
00444             MetaElem *ml /* , *ml_sel=NULL */ /* UNUSED */;
00445 
00446             ml= mb->editelems->first;
00447             while (ml) {
00448                 if (ml->flag & SELECT) {
00449                     calc_tw_center(scene, &ml->x);
00450                     /* ml_sel = ml; */ /* UNUSED */
00451                     totsel++;
00452                 }
00453                 ml= ml->next;
00454             }
00455         }
00456         else if (obedit->type==OB_LATTICE) {
00457             BPoint *bp;
00458             Lattice *lt= obedit->data;
00459 
00460             bp= lt->editlatt->latt->def;
00461 
00462             a= lt->editlatt->latt->pntsu*lt->editlatt->latt->pntsv*lt->editlatt->latt->pntsw;
00463             while (a--) {
00464                 if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00465                     calc_tw_center(scene, bp->vec);
00466                     totsel++;
00467                 }
00468                 bp++;
00469             }
00470         }
00471 
00472         /* selection center */
00473         if (totsel) {
00474             mul_v3_fl(scene->twcent, 1.0f/(float)totsel);   // centroid!
00475             mul_m4_v3(obedit->obmat, scene->twcent);
00476             mul_m4_v3(obedit->obmat, scene->twmin);
00477             mul_m4_v3(obedit->obmat, scene->twmax);
00478         }
00479     }
00480     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00481         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00482         int mode = TFM_ROTATION; // mislead counting bones... bah. We don't know the manipulator mode, could be mixed
00483 
00484         if ((ob->lay & v3d->lay)==0) return 0;
00485 
00486         totsel = count_set_pose_transflags(&mode, 0, ob);
00487 
00488         if (totsel) {
00489             /* use channels to get stats */
00490             for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00491                 stats_pose(scene, rv3d, pchan);
00492             }
00493 
00494             mul_v3_fl(scene->twcent, 1.0f/(float)totsel);   // centroid!
00495             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, scene->twcent);
00496             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, scene->twmin);
00497             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, scene->twmax);
00498         }
00499     }
00500     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_ALL_PAINT)) {
00501         ;
00502     }
00503     else if (ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) {
00504         PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
00505         PTCacheEditPoint *point;
00506         PTCacheEditKey *ek;
00507         int k;
00508 
00509         if (edit) {
00510             point = edit->points;
00511             for (a=0; a<edit->totpoint; a++,point++) {
00512                 if (point->flag & PEP_HIDE) continue;
00513 
00514                 for (k=0, ek=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, ek++) {
00515                     if (ek->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
00516                         calc_tw_center(scene, ek->flag & PEK_USE_WCO ? ek->world_co : ek->co);
00517                         totsel++;
00518                     }
00519                 }
00520             }
00521 
00522             /* selection center */
00523             if (totsel)
00524                 mul_v3_fl(scene->twcent, 1.0f/(float)totsel);   // centroid!
00525         }
00526     }
00527     else {
00528 
00529         /* we need the one selected object, if its not active */
00530         ob= OBACT;
00531         if (ob && !(ob->flag & SELECT)) ob= NULL;
00532 
00533         for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
00534             if (TESTBASELIB(v3d, base)) {
00535                 if (ob==NULL)
00536                     ob= base->object;
00537                 calc_tw_center(scene, base->object->obmat[3]);
00538                 protectflag_to_drawflags(base->object->protectflag, &rv3d->twdrawflag);
00539                 totsel++;
00540             }
00541         }
00542 
00543         /* selection center */
00544         if (totsel) {
00545             mul_v3_fl(scene->twcent, 1.0f/(float)totsel);   // centroid!
00546         }
00547     }
00548 
00549     /* global, local or normal orientation? */
00550     if (ob && totsel) {
00551 
00552         switch(v3d->twmode) {
00553         
00554         case V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL:
00555             break; /* nothing to do */
00556 
00557         case V3D_MANIP_GIMBAL:
00558         {
00559             float mat[3][3];
00560             if (gimbal_axis(ob, mat)) {
00561                 copy_m4_m3(rv3d->twmat, mat);
00562                 break;
00563             }
00564             /* if not gimbal, fall through to normal */
00565         }
00566         case V3D_MANIP_NORMAL:
00567             if (obedit || ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
00568                 float mat[3][3];
00569                 ED_getTransformOrientationMatrix(C, mat, (v3d->around == V3D_ACTIVE));
00570                 copy_m4_m3(rv3d->twmat, mat);
00571                 break;
00572             }
00573             /* no break we define 'normal' as 'local' in Object mode */
00574         case V3D_MANIP_LOCAL:
00575             copy_m4_m4(rv3d->twmat, ob->obmat);
00576             normalize_m4(rv3d->twmat);
00577             break;
00578 
00579         case V3D_MANIP_VIEW:
00580             {
00581                 float mat[3][3];
00582                 copy_m3_m4(mat, rv3d->viewinv);
00583                 normalize_m3(mat);
00584                 copy_m4_m3(rv3d->twmat, mat);
00585             }
00586             break;
00587         default: /* V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM */
00588             {
00589                 float mat[3][3];
00590                 applyTransformOrientation(C, mat, NULL);
00591                 copy_m4_m3(rv3d->twmat, mat);
00592                 break;
00593             }
00594         }
00595 
00596     }
00597 
00598     return totsel;
00599 }
00600 
00601 /* don't draw axis perpendicular to the view */
00602 static void test_manipulator_axis(const bContext *C)
00603 {
00604     RegionView3D *rv3d= CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00605     float angle;
00606     float vec[3];
00607 
00608     ED_view3d_global_to_vector(rv3d, rv3d->twmat[3], vec);
00609 
00610     angle = fabs(angle_v3v3(rv3d->twmat[0], vec));
00611     if (angle > (float)M_PI / 2.0f) {
00612         angle = (float)M_PI - angle;
00613     }
00614     angle = rv3d->twangle[0] = RAD2DEGF(angle);
00615     if (angle < 5.0f) {
00616         rv3d->twdrawflag &= ~(MAN_TRANS_X|MAN_SCALE_X);
00617     }
00618 
00619     angle = fabs(angle_v3v3(rv3d->twmat[1], vec));
00620     if (angle > (float)M_PI / 2.0f) {
00621         angle = (float)M_PI - angle;
00622     }
00623     angle = rv3d->twangle[1] = RAD2DEGF(angle);
00624     if (angle < 5.0f) {
00625         rv3d->twdrawflag &= ~(MAN_TRANS_Y|MAN_SCALE_Y);
00626     }
00627 
00628     angle = fabs(angle_v3v3(rv3d->twmat[2], vec));
00629     if (angle > (float)M_PI / 2.0f) {
00630         angle = (float)M_PI - angle;
00631     }
00632     angle = rv3d->twangle[2] = RAD2DEGF(angle);
00633     if (angle < 5.0f) {
00634         rv3d->twdrawflag &= ~(MAN_TRANS_Z|MAN_SCALE_Z);
00635     }
00636 }
00637 
00638 
00639 /* ******************** DRAWING STUFFIES *********** */
00640 
00641 static float screen_aligned(RegionView3D *rv3d, float mat[][4])
00642 {
00643     glTranslatef(mat[3][0], mat[3][1], mat[3][2]);
00644 
00645     /* sets view screen aligned */
00646     glRotatef( -360.0f*saacos(rv3d->viewquat[0])/(float)M_PI, rv3d->viewquat[1], rv3d->viewquat[2], rv3d->viewquat[3]);
00647 
00648     return len_v3(mat[0]); /* draw scale */
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 /* radring = radius of doughnut rings
00653  * radhole = radius hole
00654  * start = starting segment (based on nrings)
00655  * end   = end segment
00656  * nsides = amount of points in ring
00657  * nrigns = amount of rings
00658  */
00659 static void partial_doughnut(float radring, float radhole, int start, int end, int nsides, int nrings)
00660 {
00661     float theta, phi, theta1;
00662     float cos_theta, sin_theta;
00663     float cos_theta1, sin_theta1;
00664     float ring_delta, side_delta;
00665     int i, j, docaps= 1;
00666 
00667     if (start==0 && end==nrings) docaps= 0;
00668 
00669     ring_delta= 2.0f*(float)M_PI/(float)nrings;
00670     side_delta= 2.0f*(float)M_PI/(float)nsides;
00671 
00672     theta= (float)M_PI+0.5f*ring_delta;
00673     cos_theta= (float)cos(theta);
00674     sin_theta= (float)sin(theta);
00675 
00676     for (i= nrings - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00677         theta1= theta + ring_delta;
00678         cos_theta1= (float)cos(theta1);
00679         sin_theta1= (float)sin(theta1);
00680 
00681         if (docaps && i==start) {   // cap
00682             glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00683             phi= 0.0;
00684             for (j= nsides; j >= 0; j--) {
00685                 float cos_phi, sin_phi, dist;
00686 
00687                 phi += side_delta;
00688                 cos_phi= (float)cos(phi);
00689                 sin_phi= (float)sin(phi);
00690                 dist= radhole + radring * cos_phi;
00691 
00692                 glVertex3f(cos_theta1 * dist, -sin_theta1 * dist,  radring * sin_phi);
00693             }
00694             glEnd();
00695         }
00696         if (i>=start && i<=end) {
00697             glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00698             phi= 0.0;
00699             for (j= nsides; j >= 0; j--) {
00700                 float cos_phi, sin_phi, dist;
00701 
00702                 phi += side_delta;
00703                 cos_phi= (float)cos(phi);
00704                 sin_phi= (float)sin(phi);
00705                 dist= radhole + radring * cos_phi;
00706 
00707                 glVertex3f(cos_theta1 * dist, -sin_theta1 * dist, radring * sin_phi);
00708                 glVertex3f(cos_theta * dist, -sin_theta * dist,  radring * sin_phi);
00709             }
00710             glEnd();
00711         }
00712 
00713         if (docaps && i==end) { // cap
00714             glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00715             phi= 0.0;
00716             for (j= nsides; j >= 0; j--) {
00717                 float cos_phi, sin_phi, dist;
00718 
00719                 phi -= side_delta;
00720                 cos_phi= (float)cos(phi);
00721                 sin_phi= (float)sin(phi);
00722                 dist= radhole + radring * cos_phi;
00723 
00724                 glVertex3f(cos_theta * dist, -sin_theta * dist,  radring * sin_phi);
00725             }
00726             glEnd();
00727         }
00728 
00729 
00730         theta= theta1;
00731         cos_theta= cos_theta1;
00732         sin_theta= sin_theta1;
00733     }
00734 }
00735 
00736 static char axisBlendAngle(float angle)
00737 {
00738     if (angle > 20)
00739         return 255;
00740 
00741     if (angle < 5)
00742         return 0;
00743 
00744     return (char)(255.0f * (angle - 5) / 15.0f);
00745 }
00746 
00747 /* three colors can be set;
00748  * grey for ghosting
00749  * moving: in transform theme color
00750  * else the red/green/blue
00751  */
00752 static void manipulator_setcolor(View3D *v3d, char axis, int colcode, unsigned char alpha)
00753 {
00754     unsigned char col[4]= {0};
00755     col[3]= alpha;
00756 
00757     if (colcode==MAN_GHOST) {
00758         col[3]= 70;
00759     }
00760     else if (colcode==MAN_MOVECOL) {
00761         UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_TRANSFORM, col);
00762     }
00763     else {
00764         switch(axis) {
00765         case 'C':
00766             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_TRANSFORM, col);
00767             if (v3d->twmode == V3D_MANIP_LOCAL) {
00768                 col[0]= col[0]>200?255:col[0]+55;
00769                 col[1]= col[1]>200?255:col[1]+55;
00770                 col[2]= col[2]>200?255:col[2]+55;
00771             }
00772             else if (v3d->twmode == V3D_MANIP_NORMAL) {
00773                 col[0]= col[0]<55?0:col[0]-55;
00774                 col[1]= col[1]<55?0:col[1]-55;
00775                 col[2]= col[2]<55?0:col[2]-55;
00776             }
00777             break;
00778         case 'X':
00779             col[0]= 220;
00780             break;
00781         case 'Y':
00782             col[1]= 220;
00783             break;
00784         case 'Z':
00785             col[0]= 30;
00786             col[1]= 30;
00787             col[2]= 220;
00788             break;
00789         default:
00790             BLI_assert(!"invalid axis arg");
00791         }
00792     }
00793 
00794     glColor4ubv(col);
00795 }
00796 
00797 /* viewmatrix should have been set OK, also no shademode! */
00798 static void draw_manipulator_axes(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int colcode, int flagx, int flagy, int flagz)
00799 {
00800 
00801     /* axes */
00802     if (flagx) {
00803         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[0]));
00804         if (flagx & MAN_SCALE_X) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_X);
00805         else if (flagx & MAN_TRANS_X) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_X);
00806         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00807         glVertex3f(0.2f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00808         glVertex3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00809         glEnd();
00810     }
00811     if (flagy) {
00812         if (flagy & MAN_SCALE_Y) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_Y);
00813         else if (flagy & MAN_TRANS_Y) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_Y);
00814         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[1]));
00815         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00816         glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.2f, 0.0f);
00817         glVertex3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00818         glEnd();
00819     }
00820     if (flagz) {
00821         if (flagz & MAN_SCALE_Z) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_Z);
00822         else if (flagz & MAN_TRANS_Z) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_Z);
00823         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[2]));
00824         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00825         glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.2f);
00826         glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00827         glEnd();
00828     }
00829 }
00830 
00831 static void preOrthoFront(int ortho, float twmat[][4], int axis)
00832 {
00833     if (ortho == 0) {
00834         float omat[4][4];
00835         copy_m4_m4(omat, twmat);
00836         orthogonalize_m4(omat, axis);
00837         glPushMatrix();
00838         glMultMatrixf(omat);
00839         glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(omat) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
00840     }
00841 }
00842 
00843 static void postOrtho(int ortho)
00844 {
00845     if (ortho == 0) {
00846         glPopMatrix();
00847     }
00848 }
00849 
00850 static void draw_manipulator_rotate(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int moving, int drawflags, int combo)
00851 {
00852     GLUquadricObj *qobj;
00853     double plane[4];
00854     float matt[4][4];
00855     float size, unitmat[4][4];
00856     float cywid= 0.33f*0.01f*(float)U.tw_handlesize;
00857     float cusize= cywid*0.65f;
00858     int arcs= (G.rt!=2);
00859     int colcode;
00860     int ortho;
00861 
00862     if (moving) colcode= MAN_MOVECOL;
00863     else colcode= MAN_RGB;
00864 
00865     /* when called while moving in mixed mode, do not draw when... */
00866     if ((drawflags & MAN_ROT_C)==0) return;
00867 
00868     /* Init stuff */
00869     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00870     unit_m4(unitmat);
00871 
00872     qobj= gluNewQuadric();
00873     gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL);
00874 
00875     /* prepare for screen aligned draw */
00876     size= len_v3(rv3d->twmat[0]);
00877     glPushMatrix();
00878     glTranslatef(rv3d->twmat[3][0], rv3d->twmat[3][1], rv3d->twmat[3][2]);
00879 
00880     if (arcs) {
00881         /* clipplane makes nice handles, calc here because of multmatrix but with translate! */
00882         copy_v3db_v3fl(plane, rv3d->viewinv[2]);
00883         plane[3]= -0.02f*size; // clip just a bit more
00884         glClipPlane(GL_CLIP_PLANE0, plane);
00885     }
00886     /* sets view screen aligned */
00887     glRotatef( -360.0f*saacos(rv3d->viewquat[0])/(float)M_PI, rv3d->viewquat[1], rv3d->viewquat[2], rv3d->viewquat[3]);
00888 
00889     /* Screen aligned help circle */
00890     if (arcs) {
00891         if ((G.f & G_PICKSEL)==0) {
00892             UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -30);
00893             drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], size, unitmat);
00894         }
00895     }
00896 
00897     /* Screen aligned trackball rot circle */
00898     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_T) {
00899         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_T);
00900 
00901         UI_ThemeColor(TH_TRANSFORM);
00902         drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 0.2f*size, unitmat);
00903     }
00904 
00905     /* Screen aligned view rot circle */
00906     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_V) {
00907         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_V);
00908         UI_ThemeColor(TH_TRANSFORM);
00909         drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 1.2f*size, unitmat);
00910 
00911         if (moving) {
00912             float vec[3];
00913             vec[0]= 0; // XXX (float)(t->imval[0] - t->center2d[0]);
00914             vec[1]= 0; // XXX (float)(t->imval[1] - t->center2d[1]);
00915             vec[2]= 0.0f;
00916             normalize_v3(vec);
00917             mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.2f*size);
00918             glBegin(GL_LINES);
00919             glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00920             glVertex3fv(vec);
00921             glEnd();
00922         }
00923     }
00924     glPopMatrix();
00925 
00926 
00927     ortho = is_orthogonal_m4(rv3d->twmat);
00928     
00929     /* apply the transform delta */
00930     if (moving) {
00931         copy_m4_m4(matt, rv3d->twmat); // to copy the parts outside of [3][3]
00932         // XXX mul_m4_m3m4(matt, t->mat, rv3d->twmat);
00933         if (ortho) {
00934             glMultMatrixf(matt);
00935             glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(matt) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
00936         }
00937     }
00938     else {
00939         if (ortho) {
00940             glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(rv3d->twmat) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
00941             glMultMatrixf(rv3d->twmat);
00942         }
00943     }
00944 
00945     /* axes */
00946     if (arcs==0) {
00947         if (!(G.f & G_PICKSEL)) {
00948             if ( (combo & V3D_MANIP_SCALE)==0) {
00949                 /* axis */
00950                 if ( (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X) || (moving && (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z)) ) {
00951                     preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 2);
00952                     manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, 255);
00953                     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00954                     glVertex3f(0.2f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00955                     glVertex3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00956                     glEnd();
00957                     postOrtho(ortho);
00958                 }
00959                 if ( (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y) || (moving && (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X)) ) {
00960                     preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 0);
00961                     manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, 255);
00962                     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00963                     glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.2f, 0.0f);
00964                     glVertex3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00965                     glEnd();
00966                     postOrtho(ortho);
00967                 }
00968                 if ( (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z) || (moving && (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y)) ) {
00969                     preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 1);
00970                     manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, 255);
00971                     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00972                     glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.2f);
00973                     glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00974                     glEnd();
00975                     postOrtho(ortho);
00976                 }
00977             }
00978         }
00979     }
00980 
00981     if (arcs==0 && moving) {
00982 
00983         /* Z circle */
00984         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z) {
00985             preOrthoFront(ortho, matt, 2);
00986             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Z);
00987             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, 255);
00988             drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 1.0, unitmat);
00989             postOrtho(ortho);
00990         }
00991         /* X circle */
00992         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X) {
00993             preOrthoFront(ortho, matt, 0);
00994             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_X);
00995             glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00996             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, 255);
00997             drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 1.0, unitmat);
00998             glRotatef(-90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00999             postOrtho(ortho);
01000         }
01001         /* Y circle */
01002         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y) {
01003             preOrthoFront(ortho, matt, 1);
01004             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Y);
01005             glRotatef(-90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01006             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, 255);
01007             drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 1.0, unitmat);
01008             glRotatef(90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01009             postOrtho(ortho);
01010         }
01011 
01012         if (arcs) glDisable(GL_CLIP_PLANE0);
01013     }
01014     // donut arcs
01015     if (arcs) {
01016         glEnable(GL_CLIP_PLANE0);
01017 
01018         /* Z circle */
01019         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z) {
01020             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 2);
01021             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Z);
01022             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, 255);
01023             partial_doughnut(cusize/4.0f, 1.0f, 0, 48, 8, 48);
01024             postOrtho(ortho);
01025         }
01026         /* X circle */
01027         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X) {
01028             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 0);
01029             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_X);
01030             glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01031             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, 255);
01032             partial_doughnut(cusize/4.0f, 1.0f, 0, 48, 8, 48);
01033             glRotatef(-90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01034             postOrtho(ortho);
01035         }
01036         /* Y circle */
01037         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y) {
01038             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 1);
01039             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Y);
01040             glRotatef(-90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01041             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, 255);
01042             partial_doughnut(cusize/4.0f, 1.0f, 0, 48, 8, 48);
01043             glRotatef(90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01044             postOrtho(ortho);
01045         }
01046 
01047         glDisable(GL_CLIP_PLANE0);
01048     }
01049 
01050     if (arcs==0) {
01051 
01052         /* Z handle on X axis */
01053         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z) {
01054             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 2);
01055             glPushMatrix();
01056             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Z);
01057             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, 255);
01058 
01059             partial_doughnut(0.7f*cusize, 1.0f, 31, 33, 8, 64);
01060 
01061             glPopMatrix();
01062             postOrtho(ortho);
01063         }
01064 
01065         /* Y handle on X axis */
01066         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y) {
01067             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 1);
01068             glPushMatrix();
01069             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Y);
01070             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, 255);
01071 
01072             glRotatef(90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01073             glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
01074             partial_doughnut(0.7f*cusize, 1.0f, 31, 33, 8, 64);
01075 
01076             glPopMatrix();
01077             postOrtho(ortho);
01078         }
01079 
01080         /* X handle on Z axis */
01081         if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X) {
01082             preOrthoFront(ortho, rv3d->twmat, 0);
01083             glPushMatrix();
01084             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_X);
01085             manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, 255);
01086 
01087             glRotatef(-90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01088             glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
01089             partial_doughnut(0.7f*cusize, 1.0f, 31, 33, 8, 64);
01090 
01091             glPopMatrix();
01092             postOrtho(ortho);
01093         }
01094 
01095     }
01096 
01097     /* restore */
01098     glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->viewmat);
01099     gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);
01100     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01101 
01102 }
01103 
01104 static void drawsolidcube(float size)
01105 {
01106     static float cube[8][3] = {
01107         {-1.0, -1.0, -1.0},
01108         {-1.0, -1.0,  1.0},
01109         {-1.0,  1.0,  1.0},
01110         {-1.0,  1.0, -1.0},
01111         { 1.0, -1.0, -1.0},
01112         { 1.0, -1.0,  1.0},
01113         { 1.0,  1.0,  1.0},
01114         { 1.0,  1.0, -1.0}, };
01115     float n[3] = {0.0f};
01116 
01117     glPushMatrix();
01118     glScalef(size, size, size);
01119 
01120     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01121     n[0]= -1.0;
01122     glNormal3fv(n);
01123     glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]);
01124     n[0]=0;
01125     glEnd();
01126 
01127     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01128     n[1]= -1.0;
01129     glNormal3fv(n);
01130     glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]); glVertex3fv(cube[1]);
01131     n[1]=0;
01132     glEnd();
01133 
01134     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01135     n[0]= 1.0;
01136     glNormal3fv(n);
01137     glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]);
01138     n[0]=0;
01139     glEnd();
01140 
01141     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01142     n[1]= 1.0;
01143     glNormal3fv(n);
01144     glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]);
01145     n[1]=0;
01146     glEnd();
01147 
01148     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01149     n[2]= 1.0;
01150     glNormal3fv(n);
01151     glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]);
01152     n[2]=0;
01153     glEnd();
01154 
01155     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01156     n[2]= -1.0;
01157     glNormal3fv(n);
01158     glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]);
01159     glEnd();
01160 
01161     glPopMatrix();
01162 }
01163 
01164 
01165 static void draw_manipulator_scale(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int moving, int drawflags, int combo, int colcode)
01166 {
01167     float cywid= 0.25f*0.01f*(float)U.tw_handlesize;
01168     float cusize= cywid*0.75f, dz;
01169 
01170     /* when called while moving in mixed mode, do not draw when... */
01171     if ((drawflags & MAN_SCALE_C)==0) return;
01172 
01173     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01174 
01175     /* not in combo mode */
01176     if ( (combo & (V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE|V3D_MANIP_ROTATE))==0) {
01177         float size, unitmat[4][4];
01178         int shift= 0; // XXX
01179 
01180         /* center circle, do not add to selection when shift is pressed (planar constraint)  */
01181         if ( (G.f & G_PICKSEL) && shift==0) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_C);
01182 
01183         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'C', colcode, 255);
01184         glPushMatrix();
01185         size= screen_aligned(rv3d, rv3d->twmat);
01186         unit_m4(unitmat);
01187         drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 0.2f*size, unitmat);
01188         glPopMatrix();
01189 
01190         dz= 1.0;
01191     }
01192     else dz= 1.0f-4.0f*cusize;
01193 
01194     if (moving) {
01195         float matt[4][4];
01196 
01197         copy_m4_m4(matt, rv3d->twmat); // to copy the parts outside of [3][3]
01198         // XXX mul_m4_m3m4(matt, t->mat, rv3d->twmat);
01199         glMultMatrixf(matt);
01200         glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(matt) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
01201     }
01202     else {
01203         glMultMatrixf(rv3d->twmat);
01204         glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(rv3d->twmat) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
01205     }
01206 
01207     /* axis */
01208 
01209     /* in combo mode, this is always drawn as first type */
01210     draw_manipulator_axes(v3d, rv3d, colcode, drawflags & MAN_SCALE_X, drawflags & MAN_SCALE_Y, drawflags & MAN_SCALE_Z);
01211 
01212     /* Z cube */
01213     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, dz);
01214     if (drawflags & MAN_SCALE_Z) {
01215         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_Z);
01216         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[2]));
01217         drawsolidcube(cusize);
01218     }
01219     /* X cube */
01220     glTranslatef(dz, 0.0, -dz);
01221     if (drawflags & MAN_SCALE_X) {
01222         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_X);
01223         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[0]));
01224         drawsolidcube(cusize);
01225     }
01226     /* Y cube */
01227     glTranslatef(-dz, dz, 0.0);
01228     if (drawflags & MAN_SCALE_Y) {
01229         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_Y);
01230         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[1]));
01231         drawsolidcube(cusize);
01232     }
01233 
01234     /* if shiftkey, center point as last, for selectbuffer order */
01235     if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) {
01236         int shift= 0; // XXX
01237 
01238         if (shift) {
01239             glTranslatef(0.0, -dz, 0.0);
01240             glLoadName(MAN_SCALE_C);
01241             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01242             glVertex3f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01243             glEnd();
01244         }
01245     }
01246 
01247     /* restore */
01248     glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->viewmat);
01249 
01250     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01251     glFrontFace(GL_CCW);
01252 }
01253 
01254 
01255 static void draw_cone(GLUquadricObj *qobj, float len, float width)
01256 {
01257     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -0.5f*len);
01258     gluCylinder(qobj, width, 0.0, len, 8, 1);
01259     gluQuadricOrientation(qobj, GLU_INSIDE);
01260     gluDisk(qobj, 0.0, width, 8, 1);
01261     gluQuadricOrientation(qobj, GLU_OUTSIDE);
01262     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 0.5f*len);
01263 }
01264 
01265 static void draw_cylinder(GLUquadricObj *qobj, float len, float width)
01266 {
01267 
01268     width*= 0.8f;   // just for beauty
01269 
01270     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -0.5f*len);
01271     gluCylinder(qobj, width, width, len, 8, 1);
01272     gluQuadricOrientation(qobj, GLU_INSIDE);
01273     gluDisk(qobj, 0.0, width, 8, 1);
01274     gluQuadricOrientation(qobj, GLU_OUTSIDE);
01275     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, len);
01276     gluDisk(qobj, 0.0, width, 8, 1);
01277     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -0.5f*len);
01278 }
01279 
01280 
01281 static void draw_manipulator_translate(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int UNUSED(moving), int drawflags, int combo, int colcode)
01282 {
01283     GLUquadricObj *qobj;
01284     float cylen= 0.01f*(float)U.tw_handlesize;
01285     float cywid= 0.25f*cylen, dz, size;
01286     float unitmat[4][4];
01287     int shift= 0; // XXX
01288 
01289     /* when called while moving in mixed mode, do not draw when... */
01290     if ((drawflags & MAN_TRANS_C)==0) return;
01291 
01292     // XXX if (moving) glTranslatef(t->vec[0], t->vec[1], t->vec[2]);
01293     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01294 
01295     qobj= gluNewQuadric();
01296     gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL);
01297 
01298     /* center circle, do not add to selection when shift is pressed (planar constraint) */
01299     if ( (G.f & G_PICKSEL) && shift==0) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_C);
01300 
01301     manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'C', colcode, 255);
01302     glPushMatrix();
01303     size= screen_aligned(rv3d, rv3d->twmat);
01304     unit_m4(unitmat);
01305     drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 0.2f*size, unitmat);
01306     glPopMatrix();
01307 
01308     /* and now apply matrix, we move to local matrix drawing */
01309     glMultMatrixf(rv3d->twmat);
01310 
01311     /* axis */
01312     glLoadName(-1);
01313 
01314     // translate drawn as last, only axis when no combo with scale, or for ghosting
01315     if ((combo & V3D_MANIP_SCALE)==0 || colcode==MAN_GHOST)
01316         draw_manipulator_axes(v3d, rv3d, colcode, drawflags & MAN_TRANS_X, drawflags & MAN_TRANS_Y, drawflags & MAN_TRANS_Z);
01317 
01318 
01319     /* offset in combo mode, for rotate a bit more */
01320     if (combo & (V3D_MANIP_ROTATE)) dz= 1.0f+2.0f*cylen;
01321     else if (combo & (V3D_MANIP_SCALE)) dz= 1.0f+0.5f*cylen;
01322     else dz= 1.0f;
01323 
01324     /* Z Cone */
01325     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, dz);
01326     if (drawflags & MAN_TRANS_Z) {
01327         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_Z);
01328         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[2]));
01329         draw_cone(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01330     }
01331     /* X Cone */
01332     glTranslatef(dz, 0.0, -dz);
01333     if (drawflags & MAN_TRANS_X) {
01334         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_X);
01335         glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01336         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[0]));
01337         draw_cone(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01338         glRotatef(-90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01339     }
01340     /* Y Cone */
01341     glTranslatef(-dz, dz, 0.0);
01342     if (drawflags & MAN_TRANS_Y) {
01343         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_TRANS_Y);
01344         glRotatef(-90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01345         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, axisBlendAngle(rv3d->twangle[1]));
01346         draw_cone(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01347     }
01348 
01349     gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);
01350     glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->viewmat);
01351 
01352     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01353 
01354 }
01355 
01356 static void draw_manipulator_rotate_cyl(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int moving, int drawflags, int combo, int colcode)
01357 {
01358     GLUquadricObj *qobj;
01359     float size;
01360     float cylen= 0.01f*(float)U.tw_handlesize;
01361     float cywid= 0.25f*cylen;
01362 
01363     /* when called while moving in mixed mode, do not draw when... */
01364     if ((drawflags & MAN_ROT_C)==0) return;
01365 
01366     /* prepare for screen aligned draw */
01367     glPushMatrix();
01368     size= screen_aligned(rv3d, rv3d->twmat);
01369 
01370     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01371 
01372     qobj= gluNewQuadric();
01373 
01374     /* Screen aligned view rot circle */
01375     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_V) {
01376         float unitmat[4][4]= MAT4_UNITY;
01377 
01378         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_V);
01379         UI_ThemeColor(TH_TRANSFORM);
01380         drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, unitmat[3], 1.2f*size, unitmat);
01381 
01382         if (moving) {
01383             float vec[3];
01384             vec[0]= 0; // XXX (float)(t->imval[0] - t->center2d[0]);
01385             vec[1]= 0; // XXX (float)(t->imval[1] - t->center2d[1]);
01386             vec[2]= 0.0f;
01387             normalize_v3(vec);
01388             mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.2f*size);
01389             glBegin(GL_LINES);
01390             glVertex3f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01391             glVertex3fv(vec);
01392             glEnd();
01393         }
01394     }
01395     glPopMatrix();
01396 
01397     /* apply the transform delta */
01398     if (moving) {
01399         float matt[4][4];
01400         copy_m4_m4(matt, rv3d->twmat); // to copy the parts outside of [3][3]
01401         // XXX      if (t->flag & T_USES_MANIPULATOR) {
01402         // XXX          mul_m4_m3m4(matt, t->mat, rv3d->twmat);
01403         // XXX }
01404         glMultMatrixf(matt);
01405     }
01406     else {
01407         glMultMatrixf(rv3d->twmat);
01408     }
01409 
01410     glFrontFace(is_negative_m4(rv3d->twmat) ? GL_CW:GL_CCW);
01411 
01412     /* axis */
01413     if ( (G.f & G_PICKSEL)==0 ) {
01414 
01415         // only draw axis when combo didn't draw scale axes
01416         if ((combo & V3D_MANIP_SCALE)==0)
01417             draw_manipulator_axes(v3d, rv3d, colcode, drawflags & MAN_ROT_X, drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y, drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z);
01418 
01419         /* only has to be set when not in picking */
01420         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL);
01421     }
01422 
01423     /* Z cyl */
01424     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
01425     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Z) {
01426         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Z);
01427         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Z', colcode, 255);
01428         draw_cylinder(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01429     }
01430     /* X cyl */
01431     glTranslatef(1.0, 0.0, -1.0);
01432     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_X) {
01433         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_X);
01434         glRotatef(90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01435         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'X', colcode, 255);
01436         draw_cylinder(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01437         glRotatef(-90.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01438     }
01439     /* Y cylinder */
01440     glTranslatef(-1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
01441     if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_Y) {
01442         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) glLoadName(MAN_ROT_Y);
01443         glRotatef(-90.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01444         manipulator_setcolor(v3d, 'Y', colcode, 255);
01445         draw_cylinder(qobj, cylen, cywid);
01446     }
01447 
01448     /* restore */
01449 
01450     gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);
01451     glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->viewmat);
01452 
01453     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01454 
01455 }
01456 
01457 
01458 /* ********************************************* */
01459 
01460 /* main call, does calc centers & orientation too */
01461 /* uses global G.moving */
01462 static int drawflags= 0xFFFF;       // only for the calls below, belongs in scene...?
01463 
01464 void BIF_draw_manipulator(const bContext *C)
01465 {
01466     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01467     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
01468     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01469     View3D *v3d= sa->spacedata.first;
01470     RegionView3D *rv3d= ar->regiondata;
01471     int totsel;
01472 
01473     if (!(v3d->twflag & V3D_USE_MANIPULATOR)) return;
01474 //  if (G.moving && (G.moving & G_TRANSFORM_MANIP)==0) return;
01475 
01476 //  if (G.moving==0) {
01477     {
01478         v3d->twflag &= ~V3D_DRAW_MANIPULATOR;
01479 
01480         totsel= calc_manipulator_stats(C);
01481         if (totsel==0) return;
01482 
01483         v3d->twflag |= V3D_DRAW_MANIPULATOR;
01484 
01485         /* now we can define center */
01486         switch(v3d->around) {
01487         case V3D_CENTER:
01488         case V3D_ACTIVE:
01489             rv3d->twmat[3][0]= (scene->twmin[0] + scene->twmax[0])/2.0f;
01490             rv3d->twmat[3][1]= (scene->twmin[1] + scene->twmax[1])/2.0f;
01491             rv3d->twmat[3][2]= (scene->twmin[2] + scene->twmax[2])/2.0f;
01492             if (v3d->around==V3D_ACTIVE && scene->obedit==NULL) {
01493                 Object *ob= OBACT;
01494                 if (ob && !(ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE))
01495                     copy_v3_v3(rv3d->twmat[3], ob->obmat[3]);
01496             }
01497             break;
01498         case V3D_LOCAL:
01499         case V3D_CENTROID:
01500             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->twmat[3], scene->twcent);
01501             break;
01502         case V3D_CURSOR:
01503             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->twmat[3], give_cursor(scene, v3d));
01504             break;
01505         }
01506 
01507         mul_mat3_m4_fl(rv3d->twmat, ED_view3d_pixel_size(rv3d, rv3d->twmat[3]) * U.tw_size * 5.0f);
01508     }
01509 
01510     test_manipulator_axis(C);
01511     drawflags= rv3d->twdrawflag;    /* set in calc_manipulator_stats */
01512 
01513     if (v3d->twflag & V3D_DRAW_MANIPULATOR) {
01514 
01515         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
01516         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01517         if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_ROTATE) {
01518 
01519             if (G.rt==3) {
01520                 if (G.moving) draw_manipulator_rotate_cyl(v3d, rv3d, 1, drawflags, v3d->twtype, MAN_MOVECOL);
01521                 else draw_manipulator_rotate_cyl(v3d, rv3d, 0, drawflags, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01522             }
01523             else
01524                 draw_manipulator_rotate(v3d, rv3d, 0 /* G.moving*/, drawflags, v3d->twtype);
01525         }
01526         if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_SCALE) {
01527             draw_manipulator_scale(v3d, rv3d, 0, drawflags, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01528         }
01529         if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE) {
01530             draw_manipulator_translate(v3d, rv3d, 0, drawflags, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01531         }
01532 
01533         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01534     }
01535 }
01536 
01537 static int manipulator_selectbuf(ScrArea *sa, ARegion *ar, const int mval[2], float hotspot)
01538 {
01539     View3D *v3d= sa->spacedata.first;
01540     RegionView3D *rv3d= ar->regiondata;
01541     rctf rect;
01542     GLuint buffer[64];      // max 4 items per select, so large enuf
01543     short hits;
01544     extern void setwinmatrixview3d(ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, rctf *rect); // XXX check a bit later on this... (ton)
01545 
01546     G.f |= G_PICKSEL;
01547 
01548     rect.xmin = mval[0]-hotspot;
01549     rect.xmax = mval[0]+hotspot;
01550     rect.ymin = mval[1]-hotspot;
01551     rect.ymax = mval[1]+hotspot;
01552 
01553     setwinmatrixview3d(ar, v3d, &rect);
01554     mult_m4_m4m4(rv3d->persmat, rv3d->winmat, rv3d->viewmat);
01555 
01556     glSelectBuffer( 64, buffer);
01557     glRenderMode(GL_SELECT);
01558     glInitNames();  /* these two calls whatfor? It doesnt work otherwise */
01559     glPushName(-2);
01560 
01561     /* do the drawing */
01562     if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_ROTATE) {
01563         if (G.rt==3) draw_manipulator_rotate_cyl(v3d, rv3d, 0, MAN_ROT_C & rv3d->twdrawflag, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01564         else draw_manipulator_rotate(v3d, rv3d, 0, MAN_ROT_C & rv3d->twdrawflag, v3d->twtype);
01565     }
01566     if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_SCALE)
01567         draw_manipulator_scale(v3d, rv3d, 0, MAN_SCALE_C & rv3d->twdrawflag, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01568     if (v3d->twtype & V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE)
01569         draw_manipulator_translate(v3d, rv3d, 0, MAN_TRANS_C & rv3d->twdrawflag, v3d->twtype, MAN_RGB);
01570 
01571     glPopName();
01572     hits= glRenderMode(GL_RENDER);
01573 
01574     G.f &= ~G_PICKSEL;
01575     setwinmatrixview3d(ar, v3d, NULL);
01576     mult_m4_m4m4(rv3d->persmat, rv3d->winmat, rv3d->viewmat);
01577 
01578     if (hits==1) return buffer[3];
01579     else if (hits>1) {
01580         GLuint val, dep, mindep=0, mindeprot=0, minval=0, minvalrot=0;
01581         int a;
01582 
01583         /* we compare the hits in buffer, but value centers highest */
01584         /* we also store the rotation hits separate (because of arcs) and return hits on other widgets if there are */
01585 
01586         for (a=0; a<hits; a++) {
01587             dep= buffer[4*a + 1];
01588             val= buffer[4*a + 3];
01589 
01590             if (val==MAN_TRANS_C) return MAN_TRANS_C;
01591             else if (val==MAN_SCALE_C) return MAN_SCALE_C;
01592             else {
01593                 if (val & MAN_ROT_C) {
01594                     if (minvalrot==0 || dep<mindeprot) {
01595                         mindeprot= dep;
01596                         minvalrot= val;
01597                     }
01598                 }
01599                 else {
01600                     if (minval==0 || dep<mindep) {
01601                         mindep= dep;
01602                         minval= val;
01603                     }
01604                 }
01605             }
01606         }
01607 
01608         if (minval)
01609             return minval;
01610         else
01611             return minvalrot;
01612     }
01613     return 0;
01614 }
01615 
01616 
01617 /* return 0; nothing happened */
01618 int BIF_do_manipulator(bContext *C, struct wmEvent *event, wmOperator *op)
01619 {
01620     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01621     View3D *v3d= sa->spacedata.first;
01622     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
01623     int constraint_axis[3] = {0, 0, 0};
01624     int val;
01625     int shift = event->shift;
01626 
01627     if (!(v3d->twflag & V3D_USE_MANIPULATOR)) return 0;
01628     if (!(v3d->twflag & V3D_DRAW_MANIPULATOR)) return 0;
01629 
01630     /* Force orientation */
01631     RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "constraint_orientation", v3d->twmode);
01632 
01633     // find the hotspots first test narrow hotspot
01634     val= manipulator_selectbuf(sa, ar, event->mval, 0.5f*(float)U.tw_hotspot);
01635     if (val) {
01636 
01637         // drawflags still global, for drawing call above
01638         drawflags= manipulator_selectbuf(sa, ar, event->mval, 0.2f*(float)U.tw_hotspot);
01639         if (drawflags==0) drawflags= val;
01640 
01641         if (drawflags & MAN_TRANS_C) {
01642             switch(drawflags) {
01643             case MAN_TRANS_C:
01644                 break;
01645             case MAN_TRANS_X:
01646                 if (shift) {
01647                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01648                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01649                 }
01650                 else
01651                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01652                 break;
01653             case MAN_TRANS_Y:
01654                 if (shift) {
01655                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01656                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01657                 }
01658                 else
01659                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01660                 break;
01661             case MAN_TRANS_Z:
01662                 if (shift) {
01663                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01664                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01665                 }
01666                 else
01667                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01668                 break;
01669             }
01670             RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "constraint_axis", constraint_axis);
01671             WM_operator_name_call(C, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, op->ptr);
01672             //wm_operator_invoke(C, WM_operatortype_find("TRANSFORM_OT_translate", 0), event, op->ptr, NULL, FALSE);
01673         }
01674         else if (drawflags & MAN_SCALE_C) {
01675             switch(drawflags) {
01676             case MAN_SCALE_X:
01677                 if (shift) {
01678                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01679                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01680                 }
01681                 else
01682                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01683                 break;
01684             case MAN_SCALE_Y:
01685                 if (shift) {
01686                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01687                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01688                 }
01689                 else
01690                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01691                 break;
01692             case MAN_SCALE_Z:
01693                 if (shift) {
01694                     constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01695                     constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01696                 }
01697                 else
01698                     constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01699                 break;
01700             }
01701             RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "constraint_axis", constraint_axis);
01702             WM_operator_name_call(C, "TRANSFORM_OT_resize", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, op->ptr);
01703             //wm_operator_invoke(C, WM_operatortype_find("TRANSFORM_OT_resize", 0), event, op->ptr, NULL, FALSE);
01704         }
01705         else if (drawflags == MAN_ROT_T) { /* trackball need special case, init is different */
01706             WM_operator_name_call(C, "TRANSFORM_OT_trackball", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, op->ptr);
01707             //wm_operator_invoke(C, WM_operatortype_find("TRANSFORM_OT_trackball", 0), event, op->ptr, NULL, FALSE);
01708         }
01709         else if (drawflags & MAN_ROT_C) {
01710             switch(drawflags) {
01711             case MAN_ROT_X:
01712                 constraint_axis[0] = 1;
01713                 break;
01714             case MAN_ROT_Y:
01715                 constraint_axis[1] = 1;
01716                 break;
01717             case MAN_ROT_Z:
01718                 constraint_axis[2] = 1;
01719                 break;
01720             }
01721             RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "constraint_axis", constraint_axis);
01722             WM_operator_name_call(C, "TRANSFORM_OT_rotate", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, op->ptr);
01723             //wm_operator_invoke(C, WM_operatortype_find("TRANSFORM_OT_rotate", 0), event, op->ptr, NULL, FALSE);
01724         }
01725     }
01726     /* after transform, restore drawflags */
01727     drawflags= 0xFFFF;
01728 
01729     return val;
01730 }
01731
